meanings.definition: Not sophisticated or refined in manners or tastes.
meanings.sent1: The unsophisticated man wore mismatched socks to the fancy dinner party.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the unsophisticated charm of the small town over the bustling city life.
meanings.sent3: The unsophisticated cat tried to use a fork to eat its dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her unsophisticated approach to fashion was like a splash of color in a black and white world.
meanings.sent5: The unsophisticated painting captured the essence of simplicity and beauty.

meanings.sent1: The unsophisticated puzzle was perfect for beginners.
meanings.sent2: His unsophisticated explanation made the difficult concept easy to understand.
meanings.sent3: The unsophisticated clock only had one hand that pointed in all directions.
meanings.sent4: The unsophisticated design of the building stood out in the modern cityscape.
meanings.sent5: Her unsophisticated recipe for pancakes only required two ingredients.

meanings.sent1: The unsophisticated solution to the problem surprised everyone with its effectiveness.
meanings.sent2: He appreciated the unsophisticated design of the tool for its ease of use.
meanings.sent3: The unsophisticated joke made everyone laugh with its basic humor.
meanings.sent4: Her unsophisticated advice cut through the confusion and provided clarity.
meanings.sent5: The unsophisticated melody of the song touched hearts with its pure simplicity.
